request.description:
This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve details of a specific hotel by providing the hotel's unique identifier in the URL path. The response will include comprehensive information about the hotel, including its name, address, contact details, facilities, rooms, and ratings and reviews.

The response will have a status code of 200 upon successful retrieval of the hotel details. The response body will contain a JSON object with various properties such as id, name, address, city, state, description, hotel_type, number_of_rooms, contact_email, contact_phone, terms_and_condition, createdAt, updatedAt, deletedAt, rooms, facilities, and ratingAndReview. Each of these properties will provide detailed information about the corresponding aspect of the hotel.

The 'rooms' property will include an array of objects, each representing a room in the hotel with properties like id, category, capacity, check_in, check_out, description, availability, price, condition, createdAt, updatedAt, and deletedAt.

The 'facilities' property will include an object with various boolean properties indicating the availability of different facilities such as restaurant, bar_launge, security, wifi_internet, swimming_pool, dstv, gym, cctv, car_hire, room_service, front_desk_24h, electricity_24h, and car_park.

The 'ratingAndReview' property will include an array of objects, each representing a user's review with properties like id, review_title, date, first_name, last_name, review, like, overallRating, cleanliness, comfort, service, security, location, createdAt, updatedAt, and deletedAt.
